'''Character Stories''' are stories in a [[Character]]'s Profile that provide [[Lore]] for the Character. They are unlocked by obtaining the character, increasing their [[Friendship Level]], or completing [[Quest]]s.

Most characters usually have 8 stories. Some Characters Stories may be altered after completing specific Quests.
